description:
After Juugo and Tensai escape from the Rising Building, Juugo receives an email from Tensai saying that Isshin plans to sell the Wizard`s Cane to Ikkaku Shunjuu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dreams and Ambitions and Denial and Attraction
Yume toka Yabou toka Hitei toka Akogare toka
夢とか野望とか否定とか憧れとか
